name: Faint Gleam (WLH Team)
description:
An0ther working d4y...You rec3ntly got a j0b in one of the offices 1n the city cent3r. Arr1ving at th3 workplace, y0u beg1n to carry 0ut another ass1gnment.

But there 1s another pr0blem - you ar3 clearly n0t al0ne her3, and this ??*!# is part 0f this 3ndless nightm4re.

ᘉᓍ 0ᘉᘿ ᖽᐸᘉᓍᘺS 1ᖴ ᖻᓍᑘ ᑢ4ᘉ ᘜᘿᖶ 0ᑘᖶ...

Features:
  • Three difficulty levels with unique maps;
  • Glitch effects characterizing headache;
  • Thick fog that makes it difficult to find notes easily;
  • AI always walks on different parts of the map, so it is difficult to predict its appearance;
